text:
The suffix for each of:

application/vnd.curl
text/vnd.curl

should be 'curl', but are currently without a value even though both are
registered with a suffix:

http://www.iana.org/assignments/media-types/application/vnd-curl
http://www.iana.org/assignments/media-types/text/vnd-curl
creator: systems-vendor@curl.com
fielding@apache.org
text:
We can't assign the same extension to two types.
I have assigned it to app/vnd.curl

Committed to trunk in rev 571255.

I checked with one of our developers, and if you can only assign an extension to
one MIME type, then txt/vnd.curl is the one that absolutely needs it.

Per his response:

>> Here's the response from our MIME type request...is this favorable or do =
>> we prefer txt/vnd.curl?

>This is BAD.  We want it assigned to text/vnd.curl
creator: systems-vendor@curl.com

text:
Redefined vnd.curl media types according to their documentation at

    http://developers.curl.com/docs/DOC-1126

in r739649

Please take the initiative to clean up your own media type
definitions at IANA.
creator: fielding@apache.org
